function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The potential for ongoing COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Continued spread of the virus and its socioeconomic effects on society","Mitigation":"Implementing additional security layers and healthy design strategies","Technologies":"Advanced antivirus technology, sustainable architecture and urban planning","People":"Global population, policymakers, planners, architects","Owner":"Governments, health organizations, design and planning professionals"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the long-term effects and changes in the built environment","Impact":"Difficulty in predicting the lasting impact of the pandemic on architecture and urbanism","Mitigation":"Conducting future multidisciplinary studies and exploring the built environment urgently","Technologies":"Research and data analysis, sustainable architecture planning tools","People":"Researchers, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, architecture and planning organizations"},{"Description":"The need for transformative changes in physical spaces to mitigate future virus attacks","Impact":"Requirement for out-of-the-box thinking and reshaping of physical environments","Mitigation":"Implementing long-term reforms and sustainable approaches","Technologies":"Advanced virus mitigation technology, sustainable design tools","People":"Policymakers, architects, planners","Owner":"Government agencies, architecture and planning authorities"}]}
